property.name: Rules
property.value: {Kirifudash} {FN6} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Fire/Nature 6 to summon this creature.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature attacks for the first time each turn, untap it after the attack. ■ Your opponent can't choose this creature with non-multicolored creature abilities or spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature costs 5 less to summon. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't leave the battle zone during the turn it was summoned. ■ When you put this creature, destroy all creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WORLD BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, your opponent puts their hand into their mana zone. ■ You can't be attacked by creatures that have less power than this creature. {FUSHIGIVERSE} Darkness/Nature 1 4 (You may put one of your creatures into your mana zone tapped to summon this creature from your graveyard for a cost equal to Darkness/Nature 1 4 minus that creature's cost. It can't cost less than Darkness/Nature 2.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MAGIBOMBER}(3) (Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top card of your deck. You may put a creature that costs 3 or less from the top of your deck or your hand into the battle zone.) ■ At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BUZZRENDER}(2) (When you pay this creature's cost, you may pay any number of additional (2). When you put this creature into the battle zone, use its Buzzrender ability once and the number of additional times you paid (2).) {BUZZRENDER}Your opponent chooses one of their creatures. Return that creature to your opponent's mana zone or hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. ■ While battling, this creature gets +5000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GALAXYSHIELD} {LW2} (You may pay Light/Water 2 instead of the cost of using this card. If you do, put this card into your shields face up.) ■ At the start of your turn, if this creature is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. {GALAXY GO} ■ At the start of your turn, if this card is face up in your shields, summon it with its cost paid. ■ When this creature is destroyed, put it into your shields face up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, during your turn, this creature can't be destroyed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, they attack this creature if able.
